title: Sales Person
job_overview: Hello, I am looking for someone with previous sales experience or customer service. We're a Real Estate company that targets Vacant Land, Distressed Houses, and Multifamily. We will provide you with access to our high-level CRM that has leads we have already generated through texting, and have already received offers are open to getting offers. Need to be highly proficient in English, and there are opportunities for a bonus for close transaction.
